message.raw:
[ 1699009 ] odemath.h dVALIDATEVEC4(v) macro

In file odemath.h there is a mistake in macro dVALIDVEC4(v)
the third element is being checked twice, while the second element isn't
checked even once.  Patch by Mathew Kula
